definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Visible in these photos are the sweep of the roofline and the stubby rear deck.
sentences.chinese: 看到這些照片是橫掃車頂和短後甲板。

sentences.english: I decided first to go out on the Murzim's afterdeck for a breath of open air.
sentences.chinese: 我想先去後甲板透透氣。

sentences.english: The parking deck had to be removed after a section collapsed and made the building unsafe.
sentences.chinese: 停車後甲板已被遣送了一段坍塌的建築物和不安全。

sentences.english: I decided to add Nelson and a marine officer to my quarterdeck.
sentences.chinese: 我決定購買納爾遜和海軍官員到我的後甲板。
